enumDescriptions.XML: The Server configuration profile format is XML for exporting.

ExportSystemConfiguration.LongDescription: This action shall perform an export System Configuration attributes.
ExportSystemConfiguration.description: This action is used to export System Configuration attributes.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.Clone: If the user intends to Clone settings from one gold server to another server with identical hardware setup, this export mode can be used.
enumDescriptions.Default: The SCP-generated profile includes all aspects of the system, such as BIOS, NIC, RAID, FC, iDRAC, System and Lifecycle Controller settings.This is the default.
enumDescriptions.Replace: If the user intends to retire a server from the datacenter and replace it with another or restore a server   s settings to a known baseline, this mode of export could be used.

enumDescriptions.Off: Host power state after performing import operation is set to Off.
enumDescriptions.On: Host power state after performing import operation is set to On.

ImportSystemConfiguration.LongDescription: This action shall perform an import System Configuration attributes.
ImportSystemConfiguration.description: This action is used to import System Configuration attributes.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ImportSystemConfigurationPreview.LongDescription: This action shall perform an import System Configuration Preview.
ImportSystemConfigurationPreview.description: This action is used to import System Configuration Preview.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.Default: Extra information to include in the export like Default.
enumDescriptions.IncludePasswordHashValues: Extra information to include in the export like Include password hash values, Include read only and password hash values.
enumDescriptions.IncludeReadOnly: Extra information to include in the export like Include read only.

FileName.longDescription: The target output file name for export or import server configuration.

IPAddress.description: The IP address of the target export or import server.
IPAddress.longDescription: The IP address of the target export or import server.

Password.description: Password for the target export or import server configuration.
Password.longDescription: Password for the target export or import server configuration in the NFS or CIFS share path.

ShareName.description: The ShareName or the directory path to the mount point.
ShareName.longDescription: The ShareName or the directory path to the mount point for NFS and CIFS, during export or import server configuration.

ShareType.description: The ShareType specifies Type of share like  NFS, CIFS.
ShareType.longDescription: The ShareType specifies Type of share like  NFS, CIFS. If nothing is specified it is a local share type.

Target.description: To identify the component for Export. It identifies the one or more FQDDs.
Target.longDescription: To identify the component for Export. It identifies the one or more FQDDs .Selective list of FQDDs should be given in comma separated format . Default = ALL.

Username.description: User name for the target export or import server configuration.
Username.longDescription: User name for the target export or import server configuration in the NFS or CIFS share path.

ShareParameters.longDescription: Share parameters are listed in this object for accessing the NFS, CIFS share locations for Export of the configuration XML file.

enumDescriptions.CIFS: Network Share type is CIFS for export, import or preview.
enumDescriptions.NFS: Network Share type is NFS for export, import or preview.

enumDescriptions.Forced: The system will forcefully shut down before performing import operation
enumDescriptions.Graceful: The system will Gracefully shut down before performing import operation.
enumDescriptions.NoReboot: The system will shut down before performing import operation. Manual reboot is done here.

enumDescriptions.ALL: The SCP-generated profile includes ALL aspects of the system, such as BIOS, NIC, RAID, FC, iDRAC, System and Lifecycle Controller settings.
enumDescriptions.BIOS: The SCP-generated profile includes BIOS aspects of the system.
enumDescriptions.IDRAC: The SCP-generated profile includes IDRAC aspects of the system.
enumDescriptions.NIC: The SCP-generated profile includes NIC aspects of the system.
enumDescriptions.RAID: The SCP-generated profile includes RAID aspects of the system.

title: #OemManager.v1_0_0.OemManager
